```{r}
library(tidyverse)
set.seed(15125141)
toy_df <- tibble(xvar = rnorm(100, 3, 4),
                 yvar = rnorm(100, -5, 10),
                 group1 = sample(c("A", "B", "C"), size = 100, replace = TRUE),
                 group2 = sample(c("Place1", "Place2", "Place3"), size = 100,
                                 replace = TRUE))
toy_df


fitness_df <- read_csv(here("data/higham_fitness_notclean.csv"))
```

Class Exercise 2.

```{r}
toy_df

table(toy_df$group1)

toy_df |> group_by(group1) |> 
  summarise(count = n()) |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = group1, values_from = count)

table(toy_df$group1, toy_df$group2)
toy_df |> group_by(group1, group2) |>
  summarise(count = n()) |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = group2, values_from = count)
```

Class Exercise 1.


```{r}
fitness_df

weekend_vec <- c("Sat", "Sun")
weekday_vec <- c("Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri")

fitness_df |> mutate(weekend_ind = if_else(weekday %in% weekend_vec,
                                           true = 1,
                                           false = 0)) |>
  relocate(weekend_ind)
## weekday %in% weekend_vec is equivalent to
## weekday == "Sat" | weekday == "Sun" 

```
